name: N26
requirements: A European passport or a German residence permit. – Read more ➞

accounts.name: Standard
accounts.description: Free ATM withdrawals, no monthly fee, and multiple languages. It's all you need. My personal recommendation.
accounts.atmFeeExplanation: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany, then 2€ per withdrawal. Unlimited free withdrawals in the EU.
accounts.creditCardFeeExplanation: Use a virtual card for free, or get a physical card for 10€.

accounts.name: Smart
accounts.description: The N26 Standard account, but with joint accounts and phone support.
accounts.atmFeeExplanation: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany, then 2€ per withdrawal. Unlimited free withdrawals in the EU.

accounts.name: You
accounts.description: The N26 Standard account, but with travel insurance, liability insurance, joint accounts and phone support. Get the Standard account, and buy insurance separately.
accounts.atmFeeExplanation: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany, then 2€ per withdrawal. Unlimited free withdrawals in the EU.

accounts.name: Metal
accounts.description: The N26 Metal adds phone insurance and a fancy metal card. It's not worth the extra cost.
accounts.atmFeeExplanation: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany, then 2€ per withdrawal. Unlimited free withdrawals in the EU.

accounts.name: Easy Savings
accounts.description: Free, limited bank account. Bunq is a great option when other banks don't accept your passport.
accounts.creditCardFeeExplanation: Use a virtual card for free, or pay 9.99€ per year for a physical card.

accounts.name: Easy Bank
accounts.description: Simple account with low fees. Bunq is a great option when other banks don't accept your passport.
accounts.atmFeeExplanation: 5 withdrawals per month at 0.99€, then 2.99€ per withdrawal.

accounts.name: Easy Money
accounts.description: Free ATM withdrawals, 1% cashback, low foreign exchange fees, multiple currencies and investing options.
accounts.atmFeeExplanation: 6 free withdrawals per month in Europe, then 0.99€ per withdrawal.
